actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961, as amended, to authorize additional authority for the Overseas Private Investment Corporation.

summary.text: Amends the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 to extend the authority of the Overseas Private Investment Corporation to issue investment insurance for the inability to convert currency, and for expropriation, to September 30, 1978.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961, as amended, to authorize additional authority for the Overseas Private Investment Corporation.
